name: Organic Essentials Spice Kits
description: Excellent starter kits of organic herbs and spices for Mexican, Indian or Thai cuisine, featuring all the essentials plus a few unusual picks–for that extra-authentic flair! Visit PLANTbrooklyn.com to see more! Our organic Spice Kits are assembled in Poughkeepsie, New York, by a team of adults with physical and medical handicaps at the Mid-Hudson Workshop for the Disabled. Mid-Hudson’s goal is to provide meaningful work for the Mid-Hudson New York area’s disabled population. All our organic herbs and spices are 100% USDA-Certified Organic, meaning they are certified by the US Department of Agriculture as products that are grown entirely without antibiotics, hormones, pesticides, irradiation or bioengineering. Containers are BPA-free and fully recyclable, and tubes are made of post-consumer recycled paperboard. Dimensions: 6″ long x 1.5″ in diameter Design: Holly McWhorter with Bjarke Ballisager Graphic Design: Holly McWhorter All rights reserved, design ©2011. DESIGN PATENT PENDING. All our Organic Spice Kits are at this time ONLY available at WWW.PLANTbrooklyn.com

name: The Organic Mobile Foodie Survival Kit
description: Everything you loved about the original, in a new stronger, more convenient package. A pocket-size set of organic seasonings that are essential for any foodie on the go. Includes thirteen organic herbs and spices, plus wasabi powder for that special Japanese kick. Contents: organic basil, organic cayenne, organic curry, organic dill, organic granulated garlic, organic ginger, organic cinnamon, organic oregano, organic thyme, organic granulated onion, sea salt, organic black pepper, wasabi powder. Visit PLANTbrooklyn.com to see more! Our organic Spice Kits are assembled in Poughkeepsie, New York, by a team of adults with physical and medical handicaps at the Mid-Hudson Workshop for the Disabled. Mid-Hudson’s goal is to provide meaningful work for the Mid-Hudson New York area’s disabled population. All our organic herbs and spices are 100% USDA-Certified Organic, meaning they are certified by the US Department of Agriculture as products that are grown entirely without antibiotics, hormones, pesticides, irradiation or bioengineering. Containers are BPA-free and fully recyclable, and tubes are made of post-consumer recycled paperboard.Dimensions: 9″ long x 1.5″ in diameter. Design: Holly McWhorter with Bjarke Ballisager Graphic Design: Holly McWhorter All rights reserved, design ©2011. DESIGN PATENT PENDING. All our Organic Spice Kits are at this time ONLY available at WWW.PLANTbrooklyn.com

name: Letter Opener
description: A Letter Opener Made (Possibly) of Old Letters A LETTER OPENER MADE (POSSIBLY) OF OLD LETTERS. The blade of this simple, contemporary handmade letter opener is constructed from a fusion of 100% post consumer recycled paper and a clear, 100% water-based resin system that utilizes cashew nut shells. Available with a handle made of solid locally grown poplar with the option of either a blackened or polished steel center screw. Visit PLANTbrooklyn.com to see more! A perfect gift for someone who spends a lot of time shuffling paperwork! Design: Bjarke Ballisager. All rights reserved. Design ©2010. DESIGN PATENT PENDING. All our products are at this time ONLY available at WWW.PLANTbrooklyn.com

name: The PLANT Herb Seed Kit
description: Grow your own herbs—in your kitchen window or outdoors! This pocket-size kit has everything you need to grow tasty herbs of your own (except dirt, since that’s cheaper at the hardware store). Grow the herbs outdoors or inside—a sunny kitchen windowsill works fine–in any container, even a coffee cup. It’s a great housewarming gift, and adds flavor to any office. The kit includes: • Seeds for 10 fragrant herbs: Basil, dill, chives, catnip, marjoram, oregano, thyme, arugula, curly parsley and flat-leaf parsley. Approximately 100 seeds for each herb are included. • Instruction cards for each herb covering planting, care and harvesting • Wooden garden markers, pre-labeled, one for each herb Dimensions: 5.25″ x 6.75″ x 0.75″ Visit PLANTbrooklyn.com to see more! Our Herb Seed Kit is assembled in Poughkeepsie, New York, by a team of adults with physical and medical handicaps at the Mid-Hudson Workshop for the Disabled. Mid-Hudson’s goal is to provide meaningful work for the Mid-Hudson New York area’s disabled population. Design: Holly McWhorter with Bjarke Ballisager Graphic Design: Holly McWhorter All rights reserved, design ©2011. All our products are at this time ONLY available at WWW.PLANTbrooklyn.com

name: 100% Grade A Cheese Board
description: This lovely slice of Swiss is made of a unique composite of acrylic resin and powdered bauxite, a mineral similar to marble. This gives it some of the same qualities a marble cheese board would have—if you chill it in the fridge ahead of time, it will keep your cheeses fresh and cool on the table for longer than a wooden board. And one hole goes all the way through, for easy hanging. The board is entirely non-porous, so it won’t harbor bacteria or odors, and it doesn’t require any special cleaning or maintenance techniques. Just wash it with hot soapy water or put it in the dishwasher, and it’ll be safe and ready for use. The surface has just enough give that it won’t harm a fine knife blade, and any knife scratches can easily be removed with a good rub using a nylon scrubby sponge. For a totally new surface, simply sand the board lightly with some fine sandpaper. Visit PLANTbrooklyn.com to see more! The boards are made by a small, local CNC milling workshop in Brooklyn. Design: Bjarke Ballisager All rights reserved, design ©2011. DESIGN PATENT PENDING. All our products are at this time ONLY available at WWW.PLANTbrooklyn.com
